recipesJson.name: FRYD Cream cookies clone
recipesJson.author: BigRed
recipesJson.description: so after many trials and errors this is as close as I’ve came to cream cookies by Fryd . It needs a few days steep for the deep fried pastry doe to calm down a little bit it’s still good as a shake and vape so have at it!

reviews.text: Steep day 3 - I subbed TFA DoubleChoc with OOO chocolate milk - Wow! Really unique cookie flavor on this, tastes like a dry crispy oreo cookie! Really nice profile, great job! Not sure if people can still get the RF flavors so this is not rated, but it should be rated and mixed way more!
